headline.main: FORTRESS PRISON FOR GAMELIN SEEN; Paris Papers Say Daladier and Blum Also Will Be Held There Till War Ends

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 4 -- General Maurice Gustave Gamelin, Edouard Daladier, Leon Blum and other prisoners at Bourrasol near here will be transferred to internment in a fortified place until the end of the war, according to predictions in the Paris press today.
abstract: K von Nidda to be 1st consul gen to Vichy Govt

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
